item.description:
If possible, please bring a couple of photocopies of whatever you are currently studying (for instance, grammar, vocabulary list, a short reading, etc.), index cards.

I have put some directions, maps, and information of the class on my website:
http://www.accidental...
item.how_to_find_us: The Stata center may not be open at 6:30, but there are generally students walking in and out, so you should be able to get in. If not, the gym door may be open. We will be sitting in the Cafe area.
item.why: You'll have a chance to work towards your own language goals.
item.name: Japanese and English Study Night
